description: This is a React component for a notes management page, which handles listing, creating, updating, and deleting notes via API calls. It manages UI state and interacts with external services and components.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes data from API and updates component state.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new note via API and updates notes list.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates an existing note via API and refreshes the note list.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note via API and updates the notes list.
